body.p:
Beriah Magoffin,
GOVERNOR OF THE COMMONWEALTH OF KENTUCKY,
TO ALL WHO SHALL SEE THESE PRESENTS, GREETING:

WHEREAS, A judgment has been rendered by the Estill Circuit Court for $50 & Six months imprisoment in the County Jail -- against Anderson Tyre, for "Malicious Stabbing" AND WHEREAS, It appears from satisfactory evidence that the case of said A Tyre presents strong considerations for interposition and indulgence of the Executive:

Now, Know Ye, That in consideration of the premises, and by virtue of the power vested in me by the Constitutiuon, I have thought proper to RESPITE, and do, by these presents, stay and respite the collection of said judgement except fees & costs for the term of twelve months from the date hereof; and do hereby enjoin all officers to respect this RESPITE, and govern themselves accordingly.

figure.ab:
SEAL OF KENTUCKY
UNITED WE STAND DIVIDED WE FALL

body.p: In Testimony Whereof, I have hereunto set my hand, and caused the Seal of the Commonwealth to be affixed, at FRANKFORT, on the 3d day of Nov, in the year of our Lord one thousand eight hundred and fifty nine, and in the 68th year of the Commonwealth.

Thos. B Monroe Jr SECRETARY OF STATE.
By Jas W Tate Asst. Secy
"Yeoman" Office -- J. B. MAJOR, State Printer.

Estill Cir. Ct
$50. & 6 Mo. Impt.
Remitted
B, M
Anderson Tyre
Issd Jany. 28. 1861
